text: Terence Brain (April 1955 – 25 March 2016) was a British animator known for his work on programmes such as The Trap Door and Wallace & Gromit. He died at his home after a two-year battle with cancer. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:2016 deaths Category:People from Bristol Category:British animators Category:English animators
title: Terry Brain (animator)
